artist: Takehara Shunchōsai; Shimokōbe Ikei (page 2b, double pages 8, 23); Niwa Tokei (double page 15); Takehara Shunsensai (double page 18, page 34b); Ishida Yūtei (double pages 33, 38, 42, 54, 56); Text by Akisato Ritō
creditline: Gift of Captain G. B. Powell, Jr., JAGC, USA
description: soft-bound book with light blue cover; white label with black text on cover and inscription in black ink directly on cover; some text pages; images include man holding a box with a cat while children look on, sailboats, fishermen in two boats, man with an ox, two archers hunting ducks with a woman, battle scene with archers and swordsmen, aerial view of seascape with fishermen with very large nets, waterfall, small group of figures caught in a lightning storm
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
text: Devoted to Muko County 武庫郡 and Ubara County 菟原郡.
title: Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights in Settsu, vol. 7
